events.name: Agreement Created Event
events.description: Triggered when a new customer agreement is created

events.name: Agreement Updated Event
events.description: Triggered when an existing customer agreement is modified

events.name: Profile Created Event
events.description: Triggered when a new customer profile is created

events.name: Profile Updated Event
events.description: Triggered when a customer profile is updated

events.name: Product Agreement Created Event
events.description: Triggered when a new product agreement is created

events.name: Product Added Event
events.description: Triggered when a new product is added to the catalog

events.name: Product Updated Event
events.description: Triggered when a product in the catalog is updated

events.name: Payment Initiated Event
events.description: Triggered when a payment transaction is initiated

events.name: Payment Completed Event
events.description: Triggered when a payment transaction is completed

events.name: Payment Failed Event
events.description: Triggered when a payment transaction fails

events.name: Payment Reversed Event
events.description: Triggered when a payment transaction is reversed

events.name: Payment Instruction Created Event
events.description: Triggered when a new payment instruction is created

events.name: Payment Instruction Updated Event
events.description: Triggered when a payment instruction is updated

events.name: Payment Instruction Cancelled Event
events.description: Triggered when a payment instruction is cancelled

events.name: Payment Schedule Created Event
events.description: Triggered when a new payment schedule is created

events.name: Account Created Event
events.description: Triggered when a new account is created

events.name: Account Updated Event
events.description: Triggered when an account is updated

events.name: Balance Updated Event
events.description: Triggered when an account balance is updated

events.name: Account Status Changed Event
events.description: Triggered when an account status changes
